title: OHS Sherpa Fleece Pet Blanket Paw Print, Winsford Check Dog Blanket for Sofa Soft Warm Fleece Reversible Sherpa Dog Christmas Blanket - Grey, 120cm x 100cm
features: Dog Warmer Blanket: Super soft and comfy check fleece throw with cute paw print design and sherpa reverse. Dog blanket with white sherpa fleece reverse allows your dogs or cats to stretch out and relax in comfort.
Grey winsford check coloured dog throws for sofas, kitchen floors, cages, outside or cars. Dog fleece blanket with fluffy sherpa design and reversible side of throw.
120cm x 100cm fleece dog blanket for sofa is the perfect large cat blanket for variety of uses within your home. Create a comfy, warm and relaxing space for your furry friends with warm dog blanket.
Fleece dog blanket made with reversible sherpa design for using as a dog throw or pet travel blanket. Soft and cosy pet blankets made from 100% polyester, with 340gsm and sherpa reverse.
Keep your house clean and tidy even with the messiest of dogs. Dog blankets washable is easy care and can be washed at 30°C.
description: Sherpa reverse dog blanket with printed paws design adds a comforting space for your dog or cat in living rooms, kitchens, cars or on sofas. Pet blankets for dogs has soft and comfy sherpa fleece reversible with printed side that prevents scratches and damages to your home. Large fleece dog blanket is made from 100% super soft polyester, with 320gm and sherpa reverse. Pet blanket sized at 120cm x 100cm which fits perfectly on floors, sofas, dog crates, outside or as pet travel blanket in cars. Dog blankets washable at 30°C is easy care and keeps blanket soft and fluffy for longer. Colour: Grey - Winsford Check Size: 120cm x 100cm Material: 100% Polyester Sherpa Fleece Care Instructions: Machine Washable at 30°C Brand: OHS
